name: WAVE after WAVE
description:
This game was made for the "Weekly Game Jam - 214"

Hi! I'm a 13 year old game developer from Sweden.

My take of the theme "Wave" was simply a wave-shooter. I'm quite new to all of this and this is the first game I am ever uploading to any kind of platform.

The game itself is really basic, not bringing much original to the table, however I started kind of in the middle of the jam so I'm happy I managed to make anything at all! I do love the rolling mechanics though...

As I said, basic. But I hope you like it as much as I do!

Tilemap - https://analogstudios.itch.io/forest

MelkerB
